entry.title: Bourne Again Shell
entry.summary: The Bourne Again Shell is a prominent part of my life. Dark moments I've felt that I'm obsoleted by modern technologies, but all of a sudden I realised that I'm as modern as smarphone users

div.p: The Bourne Again Shell is a prominent part of my life. Dark moments I've felt that I'm obsoleted by modern technologies, but all of a sudden I realised that I'm as modern as smarphone users.
